header.title: Event Planning Meeting for Time Savvy and Shaver Gaming Events
header.purpose: To discuss plans for the Time Savvy and Shaver Gaming events, focusing on venue setup, budget management, sound system, media and talent, and safety and logistics.
header.attendees: jdoe, asmith, bchan, czhang, dlee, emorris, nhakim, sebastian, jet, rohimi, kang, azfar

tasks.Description: Finalize power strip specifications for the Time Savvy car showcase layout at Center Court
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system
Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability for the sound system
Inform the team that the car showcase is at Center Court and not LG of 17
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut on the sound system quote
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites
Lock in Camlips Twitch slot for Shaver Gaming
Handle the Time Savvy media invites
Confirm the custom rack specs with TechZone and email the stash by Mission to Esports Channel
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events
Follow up with the Fire Department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear and update the shared document
Map out specific routes and timings with security for loading and unloading cars and gaming equipment for both Time Savvy and Shaver Gaming events.
Chase up the Logi Store renovation fire safety audit
